snippet.title: Royal Duality Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Royal Duality is a free dark visual novel available now:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1938040/Royal_Duality/
Itch.io: https://hyakuten-games.itch.io/royal-duality

* Multiple character POVS
* 15 endings
* 12 bonus scenes
* Partially Voice Acted
* Over 30 CGs
* 74k words
* 15 hours completion time
* This game contains dark themes. There is a full content warning available before the game begins.

The guardian of stories has been waiting for you.... He will guide you through an epic tale in a fantasy realm of mystery and magic, where wizards, vampires and fae clash in a tale with epic consequences.

Now, without any further ado....let the reading begin.

Visit our website:
https://royalduality2.wixsite.com/discover
Follow game updates on Twitter: https://twitter.com/royal_duality
